description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Harmonium is a tone matrix game with a twist!  Whether you're scribbling, drawing, or composing, the pentatonic design means it always sounds good!  And what's the twist, you ask?  Well, at any time you can turn on the "Life Mode" and let the music write itself!  Sit back and watch Harmonium apply John Conway's game of life to write generation after generation of autonomous music!
description.short: Harmonium is a tone matrix game with a twist!  Whether you're scribbling, drawing, or composing, the pentatonic design means it always sounds good!  And what's the twist, you ask?  Well, at any time you can turn on the "Life Mode" and let the music write itself!  Sit back and watch Harmonium apply John Conway's game of life to write generation after generation of autonomous music!
